name: Bitwarden Tool
natural_language_description: 这是 Bitwarden Tool 节点。主要用于: Consume the Bitwarden API

descriptionType.name: descriptionType
descriptionType.natural_language_description: 参数名: Tool Description | 默认值: auto
available_options: Set Automatically (值: auto) - Automatically set based on resource and operation
Set Manually (值: manual) - Manually set the description

toolDescription.name: toolDescription
toolDescription.description: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often
toolDescription.natural_language_description: 参数名: Description | 作用: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often | 默认值: Consume the Bitwarden API | (必填项)

resource.name: resource
resource.natural_language_description: 参数名: Resource | 默认值: collection

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: get

collectionId.name: collectionId
collectionId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Collection ID | 作用: The identifier of the collection | (必填项)

returnAll.name: returnAll
returnAll.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit
returnAll.natural_language_description: 参数名: Return All | 作用: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit | 默认值: False

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Max number of results to return
limit.natural_language_description: 参数名: Limit | 作用: Max number of results to return | 默认值: 10

updateFields.name: updateFields
updateFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Update Fields | 默认值: {}
available_options: collections (值: None) - The collections to assign to this member. Choose from the list, or specify IDs using an expression.
externalId (值: None) - The external identifier to set to this member

filters.name: filters
filters.natural_language_description: 参数名: Filters | 默认值: {}
available_options: actingUserId (值: None) - The unique identifier of the acting user
end (值: None) - The end date for the search
itemID (值: None) - The unique identifier of the item that the event describes
start (值: None) - The start date for the search

groupId.name: groupId
groupId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Group ID | 作用: The identifier of the group | (必填项)

name.name: name
name.description: The name of the group to create
name.natural_language_description: 参数名: Name | 作用: The name of the group to create | (必填项)

accessAll.name: accessAll
accessAll.natural_language_description: 参数名: Access All | 默认值: False

additionalFields.name: additionalFields
additionalFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Additional Fields | 默认值: {}
available_options: collections (值: None) - The collections to assign to this member. Choose from the list, or specify IDs using an expression.
externalId (值: None) - The external identifier to set to this member

memberIds.name: memberIds
memberIds.description: Comma-separated list of IDs of members to set in a group
memberIds.natural_language_description: 参数名: Member IDs | 作用: Comma-separated list of IDs of members to set in a group

memberId.name: memberId
memberId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Member ID | 作用: The identifier of the member | (必填项)

type.name: type
type.natural_language_description: 参数名: Type | 默认值: 2 | (必填项)

email.name: email
email.description: The email of the member to update
email.natural_language_description: 参数名: Email | 作用: The email of the member to update

groupIds.name: groupIds
groupIds.description: Comma-separated list of IDs of groups to set for a member
groupIds.natural_language_description: 参数名: Group IDs | 作用: Comma-separated list of IDs of groups to set for a member
